name: Ageno
description:
ABOUT US
Ageno is a comprehensive software house established in 2010, based in Bielsko-Biala / Poland. We’re a full-service Magento 1 and 2 eCommerce specialists. Our team includes highly skilled and experienced professionals ranging from project managers, testers, designers, and developers all working from our HQ in Central Europe in Bielsko-Biala/Poland.
SERVICES
» Strategy & Design:
Consultancy
UX/UI Design
Wireframing
Responsive Design
» Development:
Magento 2 Outsourcing
Magento 1 Outsourcing
B2C e-commerce solutions
B2B e-commerce solutions
Back Office Integration
PIM Solutions (based on Pimcore and Magento)
API Integration
ERP/CRM Integration
E-commerce platform migration to Magento 2
Continuous Support and Improvement
WordPress Development
» Technology stack:
PHP
MySQL
WordPress
Magento
Symfony
Gulp/Grunt
Sass/Less
Redis
Varnish Cache
CONTACT
We've helped many businesses grow by delivering on time on budget and with high quality. We're a ready to develop your e-commerce.
Please tell us about your project: clutch@ageno.pl
